thread.title: BRIEF-Workers Approve Tentative Agreement Between Unifor And Resolute Forest Products

title: BRIEF-Workers Approve Tentative Agreement Between Unifor And Resolute Forest Products
text:
May 1, 2018 / 7:57 PM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Workers Approve Tentative Agreement Between Unifor And Resolute Forest Products Reuters Staff
May 2 (Reuters) - Unifor
* WORKERS APPROVE TENTATIVE AGREEMENT BETWEEN UNIFOR AND RESOLUTE FOREST PRODUCTS
* UNIFOR SAYS UNIFOR MEMBERS VOTED 74% IN FAVOUR OF TENTATIVE DEAL WITH RESOLUTE FOREST PRODUCTS THAT WILL SET PATTERN DEAL FOR PULP & PAPER INDUSTRY
* UNIFOR SAYS DEAL INCLUDES WAGE INCREASES OF 2 PERCENT FIRST TWO YEARS AND 2.5 PERCENT LAST TWO YEARS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
